snippet.title: Asterigos - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Asterigos is an upcoming Action RPG to the platforms of PlayStation4, PlayStation 5, and PC.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1731070

For more information:
Official site - http://www.asterigos.com
Twitter - https://twitter.com/AcmeGamestudio
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/Acme-Gamestudio-191334024642028
